Welcome to PAL. Your Path to Assisted Living! This app is designed as a tool to maintain communication between student and counselor. With PAL, users are able to create profiles, participate in questionnaires and an instant messaging system. The main goal is to build a road to fostering emotional well-being. Here at PAL, we hope to improve your life one step at a time.
